Method Detail

getElementValues

java.util.Map<StationDateElement,ElementValue> getElementValues(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
                                                                throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves from the database a Map based on the parameter map submitted

Parameters:
params - a parameter name-value map with a keys in the following group:
  • (int) stationId or (List) stationIds
  • (int) datetimeId
  • (int) begin and (int) end (both datetimeIds)
  • (int) elementId or (List) elementIds
Returns:
a Map based on the parameter map submitted
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getElementValues

java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,ElementValue> getElementValues(int datetimeId,
                                                               int stationId)
                                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves from the database a Map of values for a single station/date mapped by elementId.

Parameters:
datetimeId - the datetimeId to retrieve the values for
stationId - the station to retrieve the values for
Returns:
a Map of values mapped by elementId
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getElementValuesLST

java.util.Map<StationDateElement,ElementValue> getElementValuesLST(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
                                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves from the database a Map based on the parameter map submitted;

Parameters:
params - a parameter name-value map with a keys in the following group:
  • (int) stationId
  • (String) yyyymm(dd) to get a LST day or month; requires stationId(s)
  • (int) elementId or (List) elementIds
Returns:
a Map based on the parameter map submitted
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getElementValuesForHours

java.util.Map<StationDateElement,ElementValue> getElementValuesForHours(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
                                                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves from the database a Map based on when the observation was last modified.

Parameters:
params - a parameter name-value map with a keys in the following group:
  • [Required] (yyyymmddhh String) endhour or (List) endhours
  • (int) hours - the number of hours to retrieve [defaults to 1]
  • (int) stationId or (List) stationIds
  • (int) elementId or (List) elementIds
Returns:
a Map based on the parameter map submitted
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getLastModsForXHours

java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLastModsForXHours(java.lang.String endhour,
                                                      int hours)
                                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns a List of YYYYMMDDHH24 datetimes of the end of the hours during which the database has been modified between endhour and endhour-hours for any station

Parameters:
endhour - YYYYMMDDHH24 end time to consider modifications
hours - the number of hours to include
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getLastModsForXHours

java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLastModsForXHours(java.lang.String endhour,
                                                      int hours,
                                                      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> stationIds)
                                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns a List of YYYYMMDDHH24 datetimes of the end of the hours during which the database has been modified between endhour and endhour-hours for a group of stations

Parameters:
endhour - YYYYMMDDHH24 end time to consider modifications
hours - the number of hours to include
stationIds - a list of stationIds
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

                                                      java.lang.Integer stationId)
                                                      throws java.sql.SQLException

Parameters:
endhour - YYYYMMDDHH24 end time to consider modifications
hours - the number of hours to include
stationId - the id of the station to include
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

insertElement

                   throws java.sql.SQLException

Parameters:

Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

insertElementValues

void insertElementValues(java.util.List<ElementValue> values)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts element values (facts and flags) for an existing observation into the database. Updates the observation's modification timestamp. There must be an observation in the database for the station/datetime already.

Parameters:
values - The values to insert
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - if the observation is not in the database already or non-unique values are in values or if some other database exception is thrown

lastModsQueryBuilder

ElementDao.LastModsQueryBuilder lastModsQueryBuilder()
                                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
Creates a new LastModsQueryBuilder object which can be parameterized and used to retrieve a List of YYYYMMDDHH24 datetimes of the end of the hours during which the database has been modified within the provided parameters

Returns:
a new LastModsQueryBuilder object
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
